synopsis.text: As an alternate narrative unfolds in the final DVD of Clannad ~After Story~, Fujibayashi Kyou takes center stage, replacing Furukawa Nagisa as the main heroine. In this tale, Ryou Fujibayashi, Kyou's sister, harbors deep feelings for Tomoya Okazaki. With Kyou's encouragement, Ryou successfully confesses her love to Tomoya, marking the beginning of their relationship. However, as time passes, whispers of a connection between Tomoya and Kyou begin to circulate, casting a shadow over Ryou's newfound happiness. As Kyou grapples with her own feelings for Tomoya, a complex love triangle emerges. Caught in the middle, Tomoya finds himself torn between the two sisters. As the truth unravels, Ryou and Kyou confront the bitter-sweet realities of love, forcing them to choose between their affection for Tomoya and their bond as sisters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
